Publication.title: CURRENT TRENDS IN COMPUTER GRAPHICS
Publication.abstractText: In this paper we give an overview of the current research trends and explore the challenges in several subfields of the scientific discipline of computer graphics: interactive and photorealistic rendering, scientific and information visualization, and visual analytics. Five challenges are extracted that play a role in each of these areas: scalability, semantics, fusion, interaction, acquisition. Of course, not all of these issues are disjunct to each other, however the chosen structure allows for a easy to follow overview of the concrete future challenges. Key words: computer graphics, rendering, visualization, challenges, computer vision. 2000 Mathematics Subject Classification : 68-02, 68U05.
